subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kevin Durant scored 26 points, including the go-ahead jump shot with 32.6 seconds remaining, and the Seattle SuperSonics stunned the defending N.B.A. champion San Antonio Spurs, 88-85, on Tuesday night to end their team-record losing streak at 14 games.
